page.title: 02ART AND CRAFT - CUSTOMS
page.content: {ART AND CRAFT}The Windmill in North Leverton is used by artist as a model, especially set against the power stations showing the old and new. Lessons in pottery, basketry, dressmaking are held during day and evening classes.{ COMMUNICATIONS} Postal delivery in North Leverton is in the mornings, the telephone is in 80% of homes. { {CUSTOMS North Leverton Feast is held on the weekend of the last Sunday of September,this probably was related to the hiring fair of Retford. A revival in the 1970's was staged at the school with dancing along the streets to music recorded in the school and played from a taperecorder. Games and sideshows were staged, with food on sale.
